section.title: OpenProvision Files and Folders
section.para: OpenProvision has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: OpenProvision looks for this file to locate openprovision configuration. See the openprovision and openprovision.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default OpenProvision installation.
Python code for OpenProvision, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for OpenProvision, where $version is the OpenProvision version.
Relax NG schemas for system definition validation.
OpenProvision stores cached content in this folder. See the openprovision and openprovision.conf man pages for cache-related options.
OpenProvision publishes completed system repositories to this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per-system-repository basis within a system definition.
